channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 23:48 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 23:48 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24/7 FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
item.description: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24/7 FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291#햔햟햨햦쒬혧햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
